data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Emotional 3: Tragic Love
data.detailed_description:
Emotional 3: Tragic Love is the third musical asset album in the Rpg Maker Emotional music pack series composed by Richard John S. Emotional 3: Tragic Love consists of emotional based compositions including expressive solo string passages and emotional vocal tracks. Each composition has both fade out and looped versions (please read loop instructions for more details). Emotional 3: Tragic Love is an excellent music asset for those who need that extra emotional impact in scenes such as tragedy, love, and sorrow.

Tracks:
01 - A Beautiful Place
02 - Believe in Us
03 - Despair
04 - Echoes of Time
05 - Fate and Sorrow
06 - I Miss You so Much
07 - Love Story
08 - Our Love is Eternal
09 - Remembrance
10 - Sacred Vow
11 - Sad Times
12 - The Heart of Tragedy
13 - The Torn Road
14 - We Share This Journey Together
15 - You Are My Happiness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
